Our Simple Blog

An unstyled, single column, blog template, great as a starting point for coding your blog.

  1. BootstrapBase
  2. Templates
  3. Our Simple Blog

Need a Custom Build?

If you like this theme, but need something a bit more custom, you can hire the BootstrapBase design team to create a custom version of this template! Email us at feedback@BootstrapBase.com for more information!

Theme Description:

Our Blog is a single column blog page template. Each blog post has a blog post heading, a date, an image, some additional information in the form of buttons, and a description block. This template is ideal for simple and minimalist blogs.

Theme Features:

  • Single column blog layout
  • Blog post heading, image, and additional information areas
  • Placeholder images by Placehold.it
